subject: Harness Racing
Records and Achievements
Horse Racing
Jockeys, Drivers and Trainers
lead_paragraph: Harness racing’s biggest star, See You at Peelers, won a division of the $145,208 New York Sires Stakes on Saturday and set a track record at Vernon Downs for 3-year-old fillies.
snippet: Harness racing’s biggest star, See You at Peelers, won a division of the $145,208 New York Sires Stakes on Saturday and set a track record at Vernon Downs for 3-year-old fillies.
